Nightstrike::

Nightstrike didn't say anything but he thought "If I don't be 
carefull I'll be in jaws"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Firestrike whirled around not knowing Megatron was there. Not 
showing 
> any fright however. "Our power was already absolute, but you could 
> not wield it Megatron. All you did was bring in a filter so you 
> wouldn't have to take the full fall when you cannot win a battle.  
> And my loyalty is not to you, but to the Decepticons, which is the 
> beggining of all and end of everytthing. Not you, or Soundwave, or 
> even me, but the power which flows through the Decepticon name 
> Megatron. That is what you always failed to know!"  
> Firestrike looked surprised not knowing where all of these felling 
> came from.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > Megatron overheard the last part, and smiled. Yes, that's it, 
show 
> your
> > fury Firestike, he thought to himself. I serve the cause, so must 
> you,
> > but don't forget, I have become part of the cause, he continued to
> > think.
> > 
> > He turned around, and held out a hand. "I again apologize for my 
> need to
> > open fire on you Firestrike, but if you had interfered, Shockwave 
> would
> > never have joined us, and our power would not be absolute. But 
you 
> serve
> > the cause, our Destiny, and that is all that is importan." He then
> > looked downcast. "But showing loyalty helps our cause, don't 
forget
> > that."
